August 6, 2015, Rose De reported directly to Amanda

I've had the pleasure of working as both an employee of Amanda's at Yogaworks and as a yoga teacher while she directed Yoga Tree.  Amanda has an incredible ability to conquer the unconquerable and make it look easy.  As a person who works in the Yoga Industry, but also who has well over a decade in successful real estate sales, I was surprised as to how much I learned from Amanda about sales and organization while working at Yogaworks.  Her talents appear endless as she demonstrated to all wearing so many different hats in her role at Yoga Tree.  Anyone would be lucky to have her as an employee or a boss.  She's tough, but delivers needed feedback in a way that is as efficient and powerful as a savvy business professional, but with the thoughtfulness of a yogi.  A rare gem of a professional and a person.  I hope we will work together again.
